name: Claude Task Master
description: AI-powered task management for structured development workflows. Parse PRDs, generate tasks with AI, track dependencies, and manage complexity.

anthropic_api_key.title: Anthropic API Key
anthropic_api_key.description: API key for Claude models - get from console.anthropic.com (recommended)

perplexity_api_key.title: Perplexity API Key
perplexity_api_key.description: API key for research features - get from perplexity.ai (optional)

openai_api_key.title: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.description: API key for GPT models - get from platform.openai.com (optional)

task_master_tools.title: Tool Set
task_master_tools.description: Which tools to enable: core (7 tools), standard (15 tools), or all (44 tools)

tools.name: get_tasks

tools.name: next_task

tools.name: update_subtask
